alert.note: Alert for Baca; Bent; Otero; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 31 at 2:14PM MDT until March 31 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Central Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Southern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... Northern Baca County in southeastern Colorado... Southern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 315 PM MDT. * At 211 PM MDT, a dust channel extended from just south of Fowler through just south of La Junta through Two Buttes, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Highway 287 between Lamar and Springfield is closed due to areas of blowing dust reducing visibility to under 1/4 mile. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Fowler, Swink, Walsh, Two Buttes, Two Buttes Reservoir and Higbee. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
